"[ ★ Important ★ ]
1. Do not delete this game. (‘Clear Data’ included. If the game is reinstalled after being deleted, all the payments made for partial charging system will be nullified.)
2. the battery is below 15%, close the game and use it again after charging. (It becomes a cause for initialization of game from time to time.)
3. When closing the game, normally close it after pressing ‘Cancel Button’.
If you touch any place, the game will continue running."
"The Market billing service is not available at this time. You can continue to use this app but you won't be able to make purchases."
"This app cannot connect to Market. Your version of Market may be out of date. You can continue to use this app but you won't be able to make purchases."
